DOC.brief_title: Cervical Cancer Screening Madagascar Using Smartphone Photos Mobile Telemedicine
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Cervical cancer lead cause cancer death female Madagascar . In country , large-scale screen precancerous lesion cytology hardly possible , lack specialist infrastructure . Visual inspection cervix application 5 % acetic acid ( VIA ) inexpensive alternative subjective since depend examiner 's experience . Mobile telemedicine promise tool order assist non-expert health-care worker rural area cervical cancer screening . Objective : To assess Smartphone may assist health-care worker ( on-site ) evaluate diagnostic reliability accuracy cervical examination smartphone photo VIA ( D-VIA ) compare conventional VIA , woman test positive human papillomavirus ( HPV ) . Material method : On-site health care worker train VIA . Prescreened HPV-positive woman refer VIA evaluation , digital image smartphone ( D-VIA ) take late evaluation VIA specialist Geneva link telemedicine . Women positive VIA result treat cold coagulation eligible . Histological result consider gold standard . The result analyze Cohen 's kappa coefficient , Mcnemar 's test Bonferroni 's adjustment multiple comparison assess performance D-VIA . Expected result : Based result project , investigator develop educational training quality assurance program health provider VIA contribute scaling-up cervical cancer control . An appropriate triage VIA reduce excessive referral rate also excessive treatment delay , give possibility `` screen ( HPV ) , see ( VIA/D-VIA ) , treat '' program single two visit .
